content.metaTitle: Villa MIR0153 - Luxury 4-Bed Villa in Jávea €1,285,000
content.metaDescription: Stunning new build villa in prestigious Cap Martí, Jávea. 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, 1000m² plot with pool. Mountain views, 7min to Arenal Beach.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0153, an exceptional new build property nestled in the prestigious Cap Martí area of Jávea, where luxury meets Mediterranean charm. This stunning single-level villa offers 165m² of thoughtfully designed living space on a generous 1000m² plot, creating the perfect sanctuary for those seeking the ultimate Costa Blanca lifestyle.

With four elegant bedrooms and four bathrooms, this property by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana combines contemporary design with the natural beauty of the northern Costa Blanca. Panoramic mountain views, a private swimming pool, and meticulously landscaped gardens create an atmosphere of tranquility and sophistication, while remaining just minutes from Jávea's golden beaches and vibrant town center.

locationSection.intro:
Cap Martí represents one of Jávea's most coveted residential addresses, where the dramatic Montgó mountain provides a stunning backdrop to this exclusive enclave. This elevated position in the El Tossalet - Pinomar area offers residents the perfect balance of privacy and convenience, with the property enjoying serene mountain vistas while remaining wonderfully connected to all of Jávea's attractions.

The location provides easy access to Jávea's three distinct coastal areas, from the family-friendly Arenal Beach with its fine sand and beachfront restaurants, to the dramatic cliffs and coves of Cabo de la Nao. The charming old town, with its historic church and traditional Thursday market, offers authentic Spanish culture, while the port area buzzes with excellent seafood restaurants and marina activities.
highlights: 7-minute drive to renowned Arenal Beach and its Blue Flag waters
1km from essential amenities including supermarkets and restaurants
Prestigious Monte Olimpo residential area with premium properties
Panoramic mountain views toward the iconic Montgó Natural Park
Easy access to Jávea's three distinct areas: Arenal, Port, and Historic Center

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0153 showcases Miralbo Urbana's commitment to excellence, featuring a single-level design that maximizes both comfort and the stunning natural setting. The property's contemporary architecture incorporates large windows throughout, creating seamless indoor-outdoor living while flooding the interiors with natural light and showcasing those captivating mountain views.
features: Four spacious bedrooms including master suite with en-suite bathroom
Four full bathrooms featuring premium fixtures and finishes
Open-plan kitchen with high-quality appliances and modern design
Expansive living and dining area with panoramic mountain views
Large windows throughout creating seamless indoor-outdoor flow
Private swimming pool set within beautifully landscaped gardens
Low-maintenance Mediterranean landscaping with native plants
Covered terraces perfect for al fresco dining and relaxation
Single-level design ensuring accessibility and easy living
Turnkey delivery with premium materials throughout

content.investmentSection:
The Costa Blanca property market continues to demonstrate remarkable resilience and growth, with Jávea consistently ranking among the most desirable locations for international buyers. This area's unique combination of natural beauty, excellent climate, and strong rental demand creates compelling investment fundamentals, while the limited supply of premium new build properties in such prestigious locations supports long-term value appreciation.

Villa MIR0153's position in the exclusive Cap Martí area, combined with its modern specifications and proximity to beaches and amenities, positions it perfectly for both personal enjoyment and investment returns. The property's appeal to the luxury rental market, particularly during peak season, offers excellent income potential, while Jávea's growing reputation as a year-round destination ensures sustained demand from both buyers and tenants seeking premium Mediterranean properties.

faqs.question: What is the total price and what payment terms are available?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0153 is priced at €1,285,000. Payment terms typically include a reservation deposit, followed by staged payments during construction, with the balance due on completion. Contact us for detailed payment schedule information.

faqs.question: How far is the property from Jávea's beaches and amenities?
faqs.answer: The villa is just 7 minutes by car from Arenal Beach and only 1km from essential amenities including restaurants and supermarkets. The location offers the perfect balance of tranquility and convenience.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for non-Spanish residents?
faqs.answer: Non-residents can purchase Spanish property following the same process as residents. You'll need a NIE number, Spanish bank account, and legal representation. We can guide you through each step and recommend trusted professionals.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for this property?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with mortgage specialists who can help secure financing for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% of the property value for non-residents. Visit our Habeno mortgage link for a preliminary assessment.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this villa?
faqs.answer: Jávea's premium villas enjoy strong rental demand, particularly during peak season (June-September). Properties in this area typically achieve excellent rental yields due to the location's appeal to luxury holidaymakers.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: As a new build project by Miralbo Urbana, completion timelines will be confirmed upon reservation. The developer offers turnkey delivery, meaning the property will be fully finished and ready for immediate occupation.

faqs.question: What is included in the turnkey delivery?
faqs.answer: Turnkey delivery includes fully fitted kitchen with appliances, complete bathrooms, interior and exterior lighting, landscaped gardens, swimming pool, and all premium finishes as specified by Miralbo Urbana.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing of the property?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We can arrange viewings of the development site and show you the plans and specifications. Contact us via WhatsApp at the provided link or call +34 634 044 970 to schedule your visit.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Additional costs typically include 10% IVA (VAT) for new builds, legal fees (approximately 1%), notary and registration fees, and ongoing costs such as community fees and property taxes. We provide detailed cost breakdowns for all clients.

faqs.question: What makes the Cap Martí location special?
faqs.answer: Cap Martí is one of Jávea's most prestigious areas, offering elevated positions with stunning mountain views, proximity to all three beach areas, and a peaceful residential environment while remaining close to amenities and restaurants.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0153 represents an exceptional opportunity to own a stunning new build property in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable locations. Don't miss your chance to secure this premium villa in prestigious Cap Martí - contact us today via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your viewing and begin your journey to Mediterranean luxury living.
